price: Saa ara na Yε’kyerεkyerε nsεm no mu pefee sεdeε abͻneεfoͻ no kwan no bεda adie.
arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ نُفَصِّلُ ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ وَلِتَسۡتَبِينَ سَبِيلُ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wakadhālika nufaṣṣilu al-āyāti walitastabīna sabīlu al-muj'rimīna
